remarks: This lemma proves that sets U(t) as defined in Lemma 1 of [BrosowskiDeutsh] p. 90, are a cover of T \ U. Using this lemma, in a later theorem we will prove that a finite subcover exists.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
